title: The Water of Purification
summary: Numbers 19 introduces the ritual of the red heifer, used to create water for purification. This water was essential for cleansing those who became unclean by contact with a dead body.

faq.question: What was the red heifer used for?
faq.answer: Its ashes were mixed with water for purifying those defiled by death.

faq.question: Why was purification important?
faq.answer: To maintain holiness and allow people to reenter the camp and worship.
